entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:17 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:17 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:17 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
